forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High near 5C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High 43F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. Low 1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Low around 35F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 42F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of light rain. Low 3C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional light rain. Low 38F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 5C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 43F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain with some snow mixing in late. Low 1C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain...mixing with snow late. Low near 35F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 3C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow. High 39F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with snow. Low -1C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of snow. Low 31F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of snow. High 2C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of snow 90%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. High 37F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 90%. 1 to 3 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Low -2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Variably cloudy with snow showers. Low 31F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3 to 5 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 2C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning will become rain and snow showers in the afternoon. High 37F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Moderating temperatures will change evening snow showers to rain showers by daybreak. Low near 0C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 60%. Snow accumulating 7-12cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with snow showers changing to rain showers as the night progresses. Low 34F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 60%. 3 to 5 inches of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 41F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low near 35F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 50%.
